versos: (longed) Psalm 119:20 - "My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.";;;
(ittai) 2 Samuel 15:20 - "You are to go with us so we will know where you should go.";;;
(kidron) 2 Samuel 15:23 - "The whole countryside wept aloud as all the people passed by. The king also crossed the kidron Valley, and all the people moved on toward the wilderness.";;;
(threw) Luke 19:45 - "Then Jesus entered the temple courts and began to drive out those who were selling.";;;
(whelps) Isaiah 13:21 - "But wild beasts of the desert shall lie there; and their houses shall be full of doleful creatures; and owls shall dwell there, and satyrs shall dance there.";;;
(amasa) 2 Samuel 20:12 - amasa lay wallowing in his blood in the middle of the road
(beds) Proverbs 7:16 - "I have decked my bed with coverings of tapestry, with carved works, with fine linen of Egypt.";;;
(hammer) Jeremiah 23:29 - "Is not my word like fire, declares the Lord, and like a hammer that breaks a rock in pieces";;;
(cushi) Jeremiah 13:23 - "Can the Ethiopian change his skin or the leopard its spots Then may you also do good who are accustomed to doing evil.";;;
(watchman) Ezekiel 33:7 - "Son of man, I have made you a watchman for the people of Israel; so hear the word I speak and give them warning from me.";;;
(porter) 1 Chronicles 9:22 - All these which were chosen to be porters in the gates were two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages
(thinketh) Proverbs 23:7 - "For as he thinketh in his heart, so is he: Eat and drink, saith he to thee; but his heart is not with thee.";;;

(mourneth) Isaiah 61:3 - "To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planting of the Lord, that he might be glorified.";;;
(victory) 1 Corinthians 15:57 - "But thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.";;;
(hatest) Psalm 11:5 - "The Lord trieth the righteous: but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth.";;;
(boat) Luke 5:3 - "He got into one of the boats, the one belonging to Simon, and asked him to put out a little from shore. Then he sat down and taught the people from the boat.";;;
